content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to current political events or news to provide specific examples of industries that have been affected by recent political changes in the region. However, in general, industries that rely heavily on international trade, such as manufacturing and agriculture, can be particularly affected by changes in trade policies and relationships between countries. The energy and natural resources sectors can also be impacted by changes in regulations, taxes, and government ownership. Additionally, political instability and conflict in certain regions can disrupt tourism, construction, and other service industries.
